NextRun.name: Next Run
NextRun.help:
Updated automatically after completing the task to set next scheduled run, typically not manually modified
However you can force immediate scheduling if you clear this text field

SuccessInterval.name: Success Interval
SuccessInterval.help: After successful, postpone next run for X minutes

FailureInterval.name: Failure Interval
FailureInterval.help: After failure, postpone next run for X minutes

ServerUpdate.name: Server Update
ServerUpdate.help: Series of server refresh time(s) as to when this task will next run, this is automatically converted to respective time zone, generally do not need to modify

Serial.name: Serial
Serial.help:
Default serial for select emulators:
- BlueStacks 127.0.0.1:5555
- BlueStacks4 Hyper-V use "bluestacks4-hyperv", "bluestacks4-hyperv-2" for multi instance, and so on
- NoxPlayer 127.0.0.1:62001
- NoxPlayer64bit 127.0.0.1:59865
- MuMuPlayer 127.0.0.1:7555
- MemuPlayer 127.0.0.1:21503
- LDPlayer emulator-5554 or 127.0.0.1:5555
If there are multiple emulator instances running, the default is reserved for one of them and the others will use different serials to avoid conflicts
Open console.bat and run `adb devices` to find what they are

PackageName.name: Package Name
PackageName.help:
com.bilibili.azurlane (CN)
com.YoStarEN.AzurLane (EN)
com.YoStarJP.AzurLane (JP)
com.hkmanjuu.azurlane.gp (TW)
If none of these please refer to your AppStore

Server.name: Game Server
Server.help: Should be aligned with package name e.g. com.YoStarEN.AzurLane > EN

ScreenshotMethod.name: Screenshot Method
ScreenshotMethod.help:
Speed: aScreenCap > uiautomator2 ~= ADB
ADB is recommended

ControlMethod.name: Control Method
ControlMethod.help:
Speed: minitouch >>> uiautomator2 ~= ADB
minitouch is recommended

HandleError.name: Enable Exception Handling
HandleError.help: Handles select exceptions, will retreat if in battle

SaveError.name: Record Exception
SaveError.help: Records exception and log into directory for review or sharing

ScreenshotLength.name: Record Screenshot(s)
ScreenshotLength.help: Number of screenshots saved when exception occurs

CombatScreenshotInterval.name: Combat Screenshot Interval
CombatScreenshotInterval.help: Frequency of screenshots in seconds taken during battle, can help reduce CPU

TaskHoardingDuration.name: Hoard Tasks For X Minute(s)
TaskHoardingDuration.help:
By purposely not adding ready tasks to pending, allows for larger subsets to be built and run en masse at a later time
Can reduce the frequency of operating AL

CloseGameDuringWait.name: Close Game During Wait
CloseGameDuringWait.help: Close AL when there are no pending tasks, can help reduce CPU

AzurStatsID.name: AzurStat ID
AzurStatsID.help: Used to identify your upload to <https://azur-stats.lyoko.io>, the ID consists of random characters and can be changed at any time

SaveCombat.name: Save Battle Drop Screenshots
SaveCombat.help: If enabled, clicks will be slowed down to ensure capture

RetireMode.name: Retirement Mode
RetireMode.help:
If mode is one click retire, in game retire settings are enforced
If mode is enhance but unable to do so, will fallback to one click retire as default

EnhanceFilter.name: Ship Type(s) Filter for Enhance
EnhanceFilter.help:
"cv > bb > ..."; may substitute a type with "?" to have Alas select a type at random
Must enter at least 1 whitespace character to disable type filtering

EnhanceCheckPerCategory.name: Number Checked Per Category for Enhance
EnhanceCheckPerCategory.help: Restrict number of ships to be checked per category before moving on to the next one if any. Ships that are in battle do not count towards this number and are skipped to the next available ship for enhancement

OldRetireN.name: Retire Common
OldRetireN.help: Only applies to old retire mode

OldRetireR.name: Retire Rare
OldRetireR.help: Only applies to old retire mode

OldRetireSR.name: Retire Elite
OldRetireSR.help: Only applies to old retire mode

OldRetireSSR.name: Retire Super Rare
OldRetireSSR.help: Only applies to old retire mode

Name.name: Level Name
Name.help: 7-2, 12-4, or SP4; case insensitive; if the level is missing, please wait for next update

Event.name: Event Name
Event.help: Automatically selects to the latest event
Event.event_20211028_tw: 復刻光與影的鳶尾之華
Event.event_20200806_cn: The Enigma and the Shark Rerun
Event.event_20200820_cn: Scherzo of Iron and Blood Rerun
Event.raid_20200624: Air Raid Drills with Essex Rerun
Event.event_20200521_en: Iris of Light and Dark Rerun
Event.event_20200507_cn: The Way Home in the Night
Event.war_archives_20180726_cn: archives Iris of Light and Dark

Use2xBook.name: Use High-Efficiency Combat Logistics Plan
Use2xBook.help: Twice the oil consumption but also twice the exp and drops

_info.name: Stop Condition Settings
_info.help: After triggering any of following conditions, the current task will be stopped

RunCount.name: Run Level X Time(s)
RunCount.help: Automatically decreases by 1 for every completion and stops the current task upon reaching zero; saving as 0 implies unlimited runs until a different stop condition is met

OilLimit.name: Keep Oil Above X
OilLimit.help: Stop current task if oil is found to be below this number

MapAchievement.name: Level Achievement
MapAchievement.help: Stop current task if level has been 100% Clear, 3 Stars, Threat Safe, or Threat Safe without 3 Stars. Non-stop implies no achievement required, thus task will not be stopped for this case

StageIncrease.name: Enable Continuous Clear
StageIncrease.help:
Suited for 100% Clear, requires sufficient fleet strength and satisfying level attribute restrictions for every level involved
1-1 to 14-4, A1 to A3, B1 to B3, C1 to C3, D1 to D3, SP1 to SP4

GetNewShip.name: New Ship Get
GetNewShip.help: Stop current task if detected new ship has been acquired

ReachLevel120.name: Level 120 Reached
ReachLevel120.help: Stop current task if all ships in fleet have reached level 120

_info.name: Fleet Settings
_info.help: Fleet 1 == Mob Fleet, Fleet 2 == Boss Fleet

Fleet1Step.name: Fleet 1 Step Number
Fleet1Step.help: Restrict tile step movement in non-cleared levels to configured number

Fleet2Step.name: Fleet 2 Step Number
Fleet2Step.help: Restrict tile step movement in non-cleared levels to configured number

FleetOrder.name: Fleet Roles
FleetOrder.help: Effective only for normal operations, non auto search

AutoSearchFleetOrder.name: Fleet Roles in Auto Search
AutoSearchFleetOrder.help: Effective only for auto search, non normal operations

_info.name: Emotion Settings
_info.help: At least one or both "Calculate Emotion Consumption" and "Ignore Low Emotion Warning" is used for these settings to be enabled

CalculateEmotion.name: Calculate Emotion Consumption
CalculateEmotion.help: Calculates emotion according to settings, if ship(s) have changed in fleet should manually edit the corresponding value for accuracy

IgnoreLowEmotionWarn.name: Ignore Low Emotion Warning
IgnoreLowEmotionWarn.help: If emotion warning triggers, it will be ignored and proceed into next battle regardless

Fleet1Control.name: Fleet 1 Emotion Control
Fleet1Control.help: Measures will be taken to ensure control is maintained i.e. wait for recovery in level or stop current task if others can be executed while waiting

Fleet1Recover.name: Fleet 1 Recover Location
Fleet1Recover.help: Configure accordingly to accurately calculate emotion

Fleet1Oath.name: Fleet 1 All Oath
Fleet1Oath.help: +10/hr emotion recovery is included into calculation

Fleet2Control.name: Fleet 2 Emotion Control
Fleet2Control.help: Measures will be taken to ensure control is maintained i.e. wait for recovery in level or stop current task if others can be executed while waiting

Fleet2Oath.name: Fleet 2 All Oath
Fleet2Oath.help: +10/hr emotion recovery is included into calculation

_info.name: HP Control Settings
_info.help: Effective only if fleet lock is disabled

UseHpBalance.name: Use HP Balance
UseHpBalance.help: Enable monitor of HP across the front row ships and re-position them if needed

HpBalanceThreshold.name: HP Balance Threshold
HpBalanceThreshold.help: If the difference in HP volume is found greater than this threshold then Alas will re-position the ships

HpBalanceWeight.name: HP Balance Weight
HpBalanceWeight.help:
Assists in Alas to accurately monitor the HP volume
Enter your fleet data in the exemplified order "front-most, middle, back-most" --> "6000, 3000, 4000" (no quotations)

RepairUseSingleThreshold.name: Single Emergency Repair Use Threshold
RepairUseSingleThreshold.help: Use one repair kit if any one ship's HP is below this threshold

RepairUseMultiThreshold.name: Multi Emergency Repair Use Threshold
RepairUseMultiThreshold.help: Use all repair kits if the sum HP volume back or front row is below this threshold

LowHpRetreatThreshold.name: Low HP Retreat Threshold
LowHpRetreatThreshold.help: Retreat if the sum HP volume back or front row is below this threshold

_info.name: C1-1 Affinity Farm Settings
_info.help: After entering, repeatedly moves between tiles to initiate ambush encounters

RunCount.name: Encounter Count
RunCount.help: Number of encounters until retreat and repeating again, recommended 32+

_info.name: C7-2 Mystery Farm Settings
_info.help: Performs minimum number of battles to acquire all mystery tiles then retreat and repeating again

StepOnA3.name: Step A3
StepOnA3.help: Effectively prevents mystery on A2 from being blocked

_info.name: C12-2 Medium Level Farm Settings
_info.help:
Use low strength fleet to level up at 12-2 and retreat after fighting all non-large escorts
Improve exp/oil consumption ratio by reducing strength of fleet

LargeEnemyTolerance.name: Large Enemy Tolerance
LargeEnemyTolerance.help: Number of large enemy battle(s) allowed before retreating

_info.name: C12-4 Large Level Farm Settings
_info.help:
Use high strength fleet to level up at 12-4 and retreat after fighting all escorts
Improve exp/oil consumption ratio by reducing strength of fleet

NonLargeEnterTolerance.name: Non-Large Enter Tolerance
NonLargeEnterTolerance.help: Retreat after configured number of battles if no large escorts are detected

NonLargeRetreatTolerance.name: Non-Large Retreat Tolerance
NonLargeRetreatTolerance.help: Number of battles allowed against non-large escorts after no remaining large escorts are detected

PickupAmmo.name: Pick Up Ammo
PickupAmmo.help: Number of battles before picking up ammo

_info.name: Gem Farm Settings
_info.help:
Warning: This is not an efficient way to farm gems, not a high-yield way to farm coins either.
Players who have recently started Azur Lane are easily superstitious about 0LB and low oil consumption, while being ignorant about character leveling.
Running this function will only make you feel fulfilled however in reality your account will not actually progress very much.
Only F2P players can obtain meaningful income through this function. the developers hope this task be treated rationally.

Fleet 1 is expected to consist of 1 0LB CV/CVL and 1 0LB Vanguard, Fleet 2 is expected to consist of support ships such as New Jersey or Shinano to provide external battle assistance.
For information about the drop mechanism/rate of urgent commissions, you can refer to <https://bbs.nga.cn/read.php?tid=27134956> (in Chinese Simplified)

FlagshipChange.name: Enable Flagship Change
FlagshipChange.help: Applies to fleet 1, switch out to new level 1 common CV/CVL after current has reached level 35+

FlagshipEquipChange.name: Enable Flagship Equipment Change
FlagshipEquipChange.help:
The flagship's equipment is replaced when being switched out by first recording the current setup
Only populated equipment slots will be replaced
If the CV/CVL preference has been configured, all 5 slots will be populated otherwise only the auxiliary slots will be populated

VanguardChange.name: Enable Vanguard Change
VanguardChange.help: Applies to fleet 1, switch out to new level 1 common vanguard after current has reached level 35+

VanguardEquipChange.name: Enable Vanguard Equipment Change
VanguardEquipChange.help:
The vanguard's equipment is replaced when being switched out by first recording the current setup
Only populated equipment slots will be replaced

LowEmotionRetreat.name: Enable Low Emotion Retreat
LowEmotionRetreat.help: Retreat when low emotion is detected and switch out both back and front ships at the same time

DoMajorCommission.name: Do Major Commissions
DoMajorCommission.help: Enable allowance of undertaking 1200/1000 oil cost commissions; Commission Priority requires "Major" be included if enabled

CommissionFilter.name: Commission Priority
CommissionFilter.help: Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired

TacticalFilter.name: Tactical Book Priority
TacticalFilter.help: Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired

UseCube.name: Use Cube
UseCube.help: Allow to undertake projects that require cubes

UseCoin.name: Use Coin
UseCoin.help: Allow to undertake projects that require coins

UsePart.name: Use Part/Plate
UsePart.help: Allow to undertake projects that require parts/plates

PresetFilter.name: Preset Filter Select
PresetFilter.help:
For convenience a few preset filters are provided
However it is recommended to use "custom" and author your own priority for projects
Note that combined with other settings, Alas will choose projects that satisfy all the conditions. For example, if "Use Cube" is disabled but your list consists of projects that cost cubes, Alas will not choose them

CustomFilter.name: Custom Research Priority
CustomFilter.help: To use your own filter, set "Preset Filter Select" to "custom". All options have been defined at  <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/filter_string_en>

FeedFilter.name: Snack Filter
FeedFilter.help: Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired

BuyAmount.name: Buy Amount
BuyAmount.help: The 1st meowfficer box purchase everyday is free

TrainMeowfficer.name: Collect Trained Meowfficer
TrainMeowfficer.help:
Collects 1 trained meowfficer each day, until Sunday in which Alas will collect all of them at once in order to complete daily missions
Then fills the training queue to full for the upcoming new week to start again
Must manually free up cattery space to receive trained meowfficers

FortChoreMeowfficer.name: Do Fort Chores
FortChoreMeowfficer.help: Completes all 3 chores; clean, feed, and play with meowfficer to get fort exp

_info.name: Guild Logistics Settings
_info.help: Master or Officers must choose a guild mission manually

Enable.name: Enable Guild Logistics
Enable.help:
Enables the following:
- Accept and complete guild missions
- Submit items in exchange for guild coins
- Collect other guild rewards

ExchangeFilter.name: Item Exchange Filter
ExchangeFilter.help:
Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired
If there is an item that you lack, priority for that exchange is lowered

_info.name: Guild Operation Settings
_info.help: Master or Officers must choose a guild operation manually

Enable.name: Enable Guild Operation
Enable.help:
Enables the following:
- Join ongoing guild operations
- Dispatch ships to complete objectives
- Optionally attack guild boss when available

JoinThreshold.name: Join Threshold
JoinThreshold.help:
0.0 ~ 1.0
0.5 means only join when progress is less than halfway through
1 means join regardless of current progress even if basically finished
Remember you are limited to joining only 2 on a monthly basis
Maximize rewards and participation by joining newly started operations

BossFleetRecommend.name: Enable Fleet Recommend
BossFleetRecommend.help:
This will automatically select your own ships to fill all 6 ship slots
Recommended to keep disabled to form your own fleet along with fellow member's support units
However if members are frequently changing their support units, may be worth to enable otherwise attacks only with 4 ships

Filter.name: Item Filter
Filter.help: All options have been defined at <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/reward_shop_filter_string>

Refresh.name: Allow Shop Refresh
Refresh.help: Refreshing will consume 50 guild coins, these are not valuable and it is recommended to have this enabled

Filter.name: Item Filter
Filter.help:
All options have been defined at <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/reward_shop_filter_string>
However unlike other shops you cannot specify the exact item, you are limited to just category and grade
The select options below are used to substitute this incapability

Filter.name: Item Filter
Filter.help: All options have been defined at <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/reward_shop_filter_string>

Filter.name: Item Filter
Filter.help: All options have been defined at <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/reward_shop_filter_string>

ShipIndex.name: Ship Index
ShipIndex.help:
Position varies depending on progress, so must manually verify the target ship's position yourself
Starting from left to right; 1 ~ 6

BuyAmount.name: Buy Amount
BuyAmount.help:
The 1st and 2nd purchase everyday are free
Discounts are applied to the 3rd and onwards, gradually minimizing until full price
Exact discounts found at <https://azurlane.koumakan.jp/Research#Strengthening>

_info.name: Gacha Settings
_info.help:
Submit new build order(s) for daily achievement
Previous orders will be dequeued before submission to allow for maximum inputs and if any are still in progress, drills will be used to expedite them
Retirement settings will be enforced if dock is full

UseDailySkip.name: Use Daily Skip
UseDailySkip.help:
Requires S Rank for respective missions to be unlocked
If not unlocked, then Alas will automatically fallback to traditional steps to complete the mission

SupplyLineDisruption.name: Supply Line Disruption Preference
SupplyLineDisruption.help: This will be skipped if daily skip has not been unlocked

_info.name: Hard Settings
_info.help:
Hard mode for chapter must be unlocked, stage must be in SAFE condition, and auto search is enabled temporarily.
Use Farm Main task to assist unlocking and achieving SAFE conditions

HardFleet.name: Hard Fleet
HardFleet.help: Must in game manually set up the fleet and ensure level attribute restrictions are satisfied

_info.name: Exercise Settings
_info.help: Runs exercise and automatically retreats when sum HP volume is low

LowHpConfirmWait.name: Low HP Confirm Wait
LowHpConfirmWait.help:
After HP is below the threshold, Alas will confirm the retreat after the configured period of time
Recommend 1.0 ~ 3.0
For cases if both you and the opponent are on the verge but waiting an additional seconds can be the difference between victory or loss

OpponentRefreshValue.name: Refreshed X Time(s)
OpponentRefreshValue.help:
Automatically updated, resets back to 0 daily
If you manually refresh, you should update this count

LastStage.name: Last EventAB Stage
LastStage.help: Automatically updated, skips completed levels in the filter, and resets at server reset time (00:00)

_info.name: Raid Daily Settings
_info.help:
Recommend manual play for faster contribution and climbing of prize ladder as raid points are awarded proportionally by speed
Enable task if slow contribution and climbing is acceptable
Fleet compositions must be made manually for each difficulty

StageFilter.name: Raid Daily Stage Filter
StageFilter.help:
Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired
Can save on oil consumption if less are attacked

_info.name: OpSi Ash Assist Settings
_info.help: Limited to 3 everyday

Tier.name: Target Level Beacons >= X
Tier.help: If target level beacon cannot be found, Alas will choose the next available level beacon regardless of conditions

_info.name: OpSi General Settings
_info.help: All OpSi activities will use these settings

AshAttack.name: Enable Ash Attack
AshAttack.help: When data beacon is full; call for assistance then attack until ash has been completed

BuyActionPoint.name: Buy AP
BuyActionPoint.help: Restore AP through oil first then AP boxes

OilLimit.name: Keep Oil Above X
OilLimit.help: Refrain buying AP if below this number

RepairThreshold.name: Repair Threshold
RepairThreshold.help:
After completion of an OpSi map; if any one ship's HP is below threshold, retreat back to nearest port for repairs
0.0 ~ 1.0

BuyAkashiShop.name: Visit Akashi Shop
BuyAkashiShop.help: After completion of an OpSi map; if detected, visit Akashi for exclusive limited items

AkashiShopFilter.name: Akashi Shop Filter
AkashiShopFilter.help:
Generally does not need to be modified or re-arranged but can do so if desired
Buy AP boxes and Purple Coins

_info.name: OpSi Explore Settings
_info.help:
At the beginning of each month OpSi is reset
The following must be satisfied:
- Manually confirm fleet deployment into OpSi
- OpSi story must be complete
- Start dock in New York port
- Turn off other OpSi tasks (Obscure, Meowfficer, etc.)
Each zone will be visited in a clockwise direction every 30 minutes until world has been been completely opened
No need to consume 5000 oil for special radar in OpSi shop

LastZone.name: Last Zone Completed
LastZone.help:
Automatically updated with map ID
Replace with 0 to reset progress
Already completed zones will be skipped

_info.name: OpSi Daily Settings
_info.help:
Completes OpSi daily activities
The following must be satisfied:
- OpSi story must be complete
- Zones must be unlocked either by OpSi explore or consuming 5000 oil for special radar in OpSi shop

BuySupply.name: Buy From Port Shops
BuySupply.help:
Buy all items from port shops
Shop inventory consists of a fixed pool that is reset monthly, items not bought during a cycle has the chance of re-appearing and blocking preferable high value items

DoMission.name: Do Port Mission(s)
DoMission.help: Accept and complete mission(s) from ports

_info.name: OpSi Obscure Settings
_info.help:
Clear obscure zones every 30 minutes
The following must be satisfied:
- OpSi story must be complete
- Zones must be unlocked either by OpSi explore or consuming 5000 oil for special radar in OpSi shop

CallSubmarine.name: Call Submarine
CallSubmarine.help: If enabled, interval increases from 30 to 60 minutes instead

ForceRun.name: Force Run
ForceRun.help:
Ignore interval, clear all obscure zones, and use AP to submit scan orders (and submarine if enabled)
Generally not needed to force run, just run in intervals unless in a rush

_info.name: OpSi Meowfficer Farm Settings
_info.help:
Attack target zones of the specified hazard level in a clockwise direction
The following must be satisfied:
- OpSi story must be complete
- Zones must be unlocked either by OpSi explore or consuming 5000 oil for special radar in OpSi shop

ActionPointPreserve.name: Keep X Amount of AP
ActionPointPreserve.help: Stops task if total AP (including AP boxes in inventory) is below this number

HazardLevel.name: Target Zone Hazard Level
HazardLevel.help: Recommend 3 or 5 as these have higher meowfficer ratio to AP cost

TargetZone.name: Target Zone ID
TargetZone.help:
Support zone ID and zone name. After specifying the sea area, it will circulate in the sea area
Fill in the default value of 0, or delete the value to cancel the specify

_info.name: Semi-auto Clicking
_info.help:
Useful when attacking a stage that has not yet been adapted by Alas, can save on tons of manual clicks
Alas will click combat preparation, click combat drop, skip story, auto-retire, and close popups
You only need to move your attacking fleet if movement is restricted and choose the enemies yourself

EnterMap.name: Auto Click Stage Preparation
EnterMap.help: Prepare your fleets before running this tool if enabled

_info.name: OpSi Semi-auto Clicking
_info.help:
Useful when attacking logger zones or OpSi story, can save on tons of manual clicks
Alas will click combat preparation, click combat drop, skip story, and close popups
You only need to choose the enemies and switch to different zones yourself

RepairShip.name: Repair Ships When Nearing Port
RepairShip.help:
Once a fleet is in range of a port, Alas will enter, repair your ships, then exit
When it is done, please move the fleet away and out of range from the port within 30s, otherwise the actions will be repeated

_info.name: Performance Test
_info.help:
Test which screenshot method and click method combination is the fastest and best for you
Speed can vary on the emulator being used and your PC build

_info.name: [CN] Uncensored Patch
_info.help:
Applicable to CN only
AzurLaneUncensored files are downloaded if not present otherwise updated to the latest revision
These files are then pushed into the emulator and restarts AL afterwards to complete the patching process

Repository.name: AzurLaneUncensored Repository
Repository.help:
Do not need to modify
Github: <https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneUncensored>
CN mirror: <https://gitee.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneUncensored>

Toast.DisableTranslateMode: Click here to disable translate mode

AddAlas.FileExist: A config with the same name exists, please choose another one
